entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:21 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
